alert.note: Alert for Medina (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 8:10PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Medina County through 930 PM EDT... At 808 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms near Lodi and Seville moving northeast at 25 mph. An additional line of strong thunderstorms extends from Oberlin and New London, and is moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Medina, Strongsville, Brunswick, North Royalton, Wadsworth, Rittman, Lodi, Creston, Chippewa Lake, Broadview Heights, Hinckley, Seville, Westfield Center, Spencer, Gloria Glens Park, Burbank, Chippewa-On-The-Lake, Valley City and Briarwood Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
